title: please don't use "ed" in the compile scripts
body:
by **gorgonzola@online.de**: 
hello

i install my system "from scratch", i.e. it's all from source. there are
about 300 packages installed on my linux system and *none* needs "ed". you
might now think that ed is part of unix by tradition, but actually no
common software relies on it - under linux - anymore. because i always care
about not drawing in redundant packages through the backdoor - including
mercurial - i beg you to drop this dependency. it is really obsolete nowadays.

many thanks,
gorgonzola
